.. _envoy_v3_api_file_envoy/extensions/cache/simple_http_cache/v3alpha/config.proto:

SimpleHttpCache CacheFilter storage plugin
==========================================


.. _envoy_v3_api_msg_extensions.cache.simple_http_cache.v3alpha.SimpleHttpCacheConfig:

extensions.cache.simple_http_cache.v3alpha.SimpleHttpCacheConfig
----------------------------------------------------------------

`[extensions.cache.simple_http_cache.v3alpha.SimpleHttpCacheConfig proto] <https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/blob/b7ce74e8cc8d882ef23146c5039712e84796950e/api/envoy/extensions/cache/simple_http_cache/v3alpha/config.proto#L14>`_



.. _extension_envoy.cache.simple_http_cache:

This extension may be referenced by the qualified name *envoy.cache.simple_http_cache*

.. note::
  This extension is work-in-progress. Functionality is incomplete and it is not intended for production use.

  This extension is intended to be robust against both untrusted downstream and upstream traffic.

.. tip::
  This extension extends and can be used with the following extension category:


  - :ref:`envoy.filters.http.cache <extension_category_envoy.filters.http.cache>`
